create.notes: Workflow creation form successfully configured with trigger (Bayzat HR - Employee is created) and action (Create task), but save failed due to 'Allowed record count exceeded!' error. Demo account limit reached (21 workflows max). Form validation and all UI elements work correctly.

read.notes: Successfully viewed workflow details including: workflow name, creation date/time, creator, trigger event, and actions. Activity log shows execution history with triggered date, status (In progress/Failed/Success), and entity affected. Individual execution details display event and action timestamps.

update.notes: Successfully edited workflow name from 'Modern Vet Test' to 'Modern Vet Test - Validation Edit'. Update form pre-populated with existing configuration. Changes saved successfully with confirmation message 'Workflow updated successfully'.

delete.notes: Workflows use soft delete via Active/Inactive toggle switch. Successfully deactivated workflow by toggling status from Active to Inactive. Workflow remains in list but is no longer active. The three-dot menu also shows 'Delete workflow' option for hard delete.
